title: Female Eunuch
description: The Female Eunuch is a landmark in the history of the womens movement. Drawing liberally from history. literature and popular culture. past and present. Germaine Greers searing examination of womens oppression is at once an important social commentary and a passionately argued masterpiece of polemic. Probably the most famous. most widely read book on feminism ever.
author: Germaine Greer
